ruleset.name: Racially charged and biased language rules
ruleset.description: A PMD Ruleset for detecting racially charged and biased language

rule.name: AvoidBiasedLanguage
rule.message: Avoid the use of racially charged or biased language
rule.description: This rules warns about the use of racially charged or biased language in Java code, variable names, method names, class names, etc. It detects the use of blacklist/whitelist and master/slave names (or derivatives). Better alternatives exist as described in IETF's Terminology, Power and Inclusive Language document (draft-knodel-terminology-02).
